casebody.data:
HARRIS
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 110A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2017 Tamika L. Henderson, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department Of Public Safety. Michael C. Byrne, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Steven. Norris Arden Adams, II, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, E. Hardy Lewis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Fraternal Order of Police, et al. J. Michael McGuinness, Attorney at Law, Elizabethtown, Megan Ashley Milliken, Attorney at Law, for Southern States Police Benevolent Association, et al.

Ryan Park, Deputy Solicitor General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of June 2017 by Petitioner:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2017."
